meanings.definition: Resembling a nook in appearance or shape.
meanings.sent1: The cozy corner of the room had a nooklike feel.
meanings.sent2: The small, secluded area was quite nooklike.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a nooklike spot to hide its toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The garden path twisted in a nooklike manner around the bushes.
meanings.sent5: The nooklike window seat was perfect for reading on rainy days.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a nook.
meanings.sent1: The secret garden had a nooklike entrance.
meanings.sent2: The cozy cafe had a nooklike atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel built a nooklike nest in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The winding staircase had a nooklike turn halfway up.
meanings.sent5: The nooklike alcove was a perfect spot for a small desk.

meanings.definition: Suitable for or characteristic of a nook.
meanings.sent1: The cushioned bench had a nooklike comfort.
meanings.sent2: The dimly lit room had a nooklike coziness.
meanings.sent3: The cozy blanket was nooklike in its warmth.
meanings.sent4: The hidden garden gate had a nooklike charm.
meanings.sent5: The nooklike reading corner was a favorite spot for the bookworm.
